content: **crocheted wine-bag in drops safran the piece is worked in the round from the middle outwards and bottom up theme christmas ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern e-375 yarn group a ------------------------------------------------------- **size** approx 8 cm in diameter **yarn** drops safran from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 50 g colour 13 raspberry 1 bag weighs approx 34 g **crochet hook** drops crochet hook size 3 mm **crochet gauge ** 24 treble crochets in width and 13 row in height = 10 x 10 cm hook size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger hook size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller hook size
